name: Despair (itch) (simonbaumy, Razer1999)
description:
Story

A divorcee mother who wanted to spend some quality time with her daughter on a  weekend camping trip,  heads in for the night...

Mechanics

Picking up teddies makes you happy.

Picking up ordnance gives you a safety option.

Controls

- E - Interact

- Space-   Stun

- WASD - Movement

- Mouse - Camera

_______________________________

Errors/Incomplete/Failures.

Camera Effect+ Sound when looking at enemy to show its causing  resource loss.

Resource drains too quickly.

Player direction /progression should be clearer.

________________________________

Inter-Campus Game Jam 2021

1st GameJam :)

Michael S. Engelbrecht  & Simon Baumann

2nd Year - Vega School.

Character Voice

Susanne Baumann
